solution_line_template: There are {quarters_per_dollar} quarters in every dollar, so ${cost_of_dress_dollars} x {quarters_per_dollar} = <<{cost_of_dress_dollars}*{quarters_per_dollar}={cost_of_dress_quarters}>>{cost_of_dress_quarters} quarters.
Libby has {initial_quarters} quarters - {cost_of_dress_quarters} quarters to repay her sister = <<{initial_quarters}-{cost_of_dress_quarters}={remaining_quarters}>>{remaining_quarters} quarters left.
